data.message: Integrate Planify into SuperAGI MCP (Option B: Claude as LLM): Added planify_context and planify_save tools to superagi_mcp_server.py. planify_context gathers repo structure, key files, and returns structured prompts for Architect→Critic→Integrator flow. planify_save writes final plan to markdown. Zero external API cost - Claude Code IS the LLM. Requires restart to activate.
data.task: Integrate Planify into SuperAGI MCP (Option B: Claude as LLM)

Zero external API cost - Claude Code IS the LLM. Requires restart to activate.
